item.title: Two Marquette men’s lacrosse players killed in car wreck near campus
item.description: Police said an investigation is ongoing and criminal charges are pending review.

item.title: The Rotary Club’s Second Annual Charity Golf Tournament 2 - clipped version
item.description: The Rotary Club’s Second Annual Charity Golf Tournament 2 - clipped version

item.title: ‘I’ll help you with it’: 16-year-old boy dies by suicide after confiding in ChatGPT about his feelings, lawsuit says
item.description: A 16-year-old boy in California died by suicide after his family says he confided in ChatGPT about his feelings, according to a lawsuit.

item.title: ADApt and play event kicks off
item.description: The players were able to take part in multiple sporting events, see sports demonstrations and learn more from community resources.

item.title: Aryna Sabalenka defeats Amanda Anisimova for her 2nd consecutive US Open title
item.description: Aryna Sabalenka has become the first woman to win the U.S. Open's trophy in consecutive years since Serena Williams more than a decade ago.

item.title: 7-day-old boy killed by family dog, authorities say
item.description: Indiana authorities say a newborn baby was killed by a family dog on Thursday.

item.title: College student accused of hiding dead baby inside closet withdraws from university
item.description: A college student accused of hiding a dead baby in a trash bag has withdrawn from her university.

item.title: Farmer’s Market Sunday Forecast
item.description: Dew points will hold the mid-70s for the weekend, which is average for September

item.title: Copperhead snake bites child at day care; 911 not contacted, family says
item.description: A 4-year-old North Carolina boy was sent to the hospital after his family says a snake bit him at day care.

item.title: Beach & Boating Forecast Sunday
item.description: Thunderstorms are possible Sunday with a better chance Monday and Tuesday

item.title: ‘We are not going to stop’: Family still seeking answers 39 years after baby was stolen from crib
item.description: A family in Colorado is still searching for answers after their 7-month-old baby boy was stolen from his crib nearly 40 years ago.

item.title: Scattered thunderstorms continue
item.description: Sunday may bring a little less thunderstorm coverage than Saturday
